data.body: According to the documentation there should be an option to import character skins with the FBX importer but the Import Skin window is missing from the main menu or does not open if tried to open through the character tool.

data.body:

My monitor's native resolution is 3840x2160.

data.title: CryEngine 5.3. Dedicated configuration not exists
data.body:
Dedicated configuration not exists in CryEngine 5.3

I compile all dll's with DEDICATED_SERVER define and now server work, but have some problem : 
1) If not modify CryDefaultEntities you get crash. 
You need update LightEntity and EvironmentProbe, because this entities use render system
For e.g. you can use #ifndef DEDICATED_SERVER for onResetState() functions and also in GetCubemapTextures()
2) Sooooo slow loading map
```
<22:12:15>   58 animation-assets loaded (total assets: 53)
<22:12:20> ===== Finished Preloading 2 Characters in 9.16 seconds ====
<22:12:20> ===== Preloading CGAs ====
<22:12:29> ===== Finished Preloading 0 CGAs in 8.79 seconds ====
<22:12:29> ===== Preloading CDFs ====
<22:12:37> ===== Finished Preloading 1 CDFs in 8.82 seconds ====
<22:12:37> Finished loading level characters (26.8 sec)
<22:12:37> SetGlobalState 5->6 'LEVEL_LOAD_CHARACTERS'->'LEVEL_LOAD_STATIC_WORLD' 26.8 seconds
```

data.title: CE5.3 Using Voxel Based Volumetric Fog in Game mode causes permanent freeze
data.body: Having e_VolumetricFog enabled in the system.cfg while running in pure game mode (exported to engine) will cause the entire game to freeze indefinitely and will not even crash.

data.title: CryEngine 5.3. Can't create UI event system in plugin
Spawn Param serialization "broken" -> disconnect on join
data.body:
With the new changes to the entity system there were also changes to the way spawn params are serialized **TO** an entity. Reading them from an entity and all attached gameobject extensions works still fine, which causes a malformed paket problem on the receiving client.
The problem is that only the primary entity class gets its SerializeSpawnInfo called on instantiation which leaves unread values in the paket buffer, causing the paket to be "finished" before completely read.
At the moment this can be solved by manually getting the spawn serializer from the game object in the primary classes init function and manually calling the SerializeSpawnInfo function.
This is sub-optimal because the extensions init function might rely on data from this.

data.title: CryEngine 5.3. Freeze when exiting the launcher
data.body:
When you use "quit" console command or use gEnv->pSystem->Quit(); game launcher "Freeze" and nothing happening

**Solution :** 
Go to CrySystem/Source/System.cpp
Find void CSystem::ShutDown() function
Find `if (m_pSystemEventDispatcher)` constuction
And update `OnSystemEvent` function to : 
`m_pSystemEventDispatcher->OnSystemEvent(ESYSTEM_EVENT_FULL_SHUTDOWN, 0, 0, true);`

P.s. Also if you use debugger when game shutdown you get critical exception in CryScaleformHelper.dll

data.title: Weapons are always shaking in the hands (GameSDK 5.3)
data.body:
Weapons is not attached to bones correctly at third person view. And as result - they are shaking on run or any animation. That may be reproduced at the GameSDK 5.3 (no such problem at 5.2).
Any ideas of what can be wrong?

And also - did you ever tried to test GameSDK before new releases? Do you have any QA or something? Because i'm really amazed, how its possible to not detect so visible bug.

data.title: 5.3 Random-to-Nearly Always Crashes
data.body:
I believe the culprit to be: `[Assert] Q_ASSERT_XQVector<T>::operator[]index out of range [File=D:\jk\gamesdk_release\Code\SDKs\Qt\5.6\msvc2015_64\Qt\include\QtCore/qvector.h]

Everytime this happens, which is now everytime I try to load up levels that I have worked on recently, that line is the last in the log.  I'm not sure what the next best step is here, but I could use some help, guidance or a fix.  It's only in 5.3.  It seems to be about 4-5 seconds after loading up the levels, or randomly when working on the level.`

[editor.txt](https://github.com/CRYTEK-CRYENGINE/CRYENGINE/files/670310/editor.txt)
[error.txt](https://github.com/CRYTEK-CRYENGINE/CRYENGINE/files/670311/error.txt)

data.title: Error and Warning Festival at blank empty projects or any project
data.body:
Hello all

I dont know if this happen with more people, but Im getting a bunch of error and warning notifications with empty, template and any other kind of project, If just create a new C# blank project, create the map and I get all this errors and warning notifications, but the scene dont have nothing, just a map and one empty material, nothing else, same if I open a project from Crytek, like the Bar Interior, release today at the marketplace...

At the Bar Interior assets the CE show I have 253.087 errors (that insane), some time show I have 5k+ errors...and all this I got with the Bar Interior asset, I did change or add nothing, I just open the project and got all this "Error Festival"

This happen with the 5.2 and still happening with the 5.3, and has I said, happen with blank, template and any other type of project, and in all this project I just create the project, and the first thing I see when the engine open, are this errors/warnings/notifications....

I have create a post in the forum about this, but no official answer to this issue.
https://www.cryengine.com/community/viewtopic.php?f=355&t=135531

Thanks all 

![ce5errorfest1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2567170/21431458/feaaf2f2-c86f-11e6-94a4-e2d14e1582e8.png)

data.title: No inclusion of steam in build system
data.body: There is no option or check for steamworks availability in the cmake files. While CryLobby is no longer maintained, its still something a lot of people migh require, even if its just down to the base initialization thats done in CrySystem.

data.title: No dedicated server build configuration.
data.body:
At the moment there is no build configuration that defines "DEDICATED_SERVE" or supports output to a seperate folder, which is needed for some of the specialized functionality as well as performance (no renderer/audio).
I created one myself, but i´d rather see it coming with the engine by default.

data.title: MenuRender3DModelMgr crashes when returning to the menu after unloading a level
data.body: There is a explanation of how this occurs and a possible fix for this issue in this pull request: https://github.com/CRYTEK-CRYENGINE/CRYENGINE/pull/75

data.title: Re-initialise camera vars in UnloadLevel in Cry3DEngine
data.body:
This fixes a crash when using the 3D engine without having a level
loaded, as these camera variables are used when requesting a raycast for
`CObjManager::ProcessObjectsStreaming` in `ObjManStreaming.cpp`.

`ProcessObjectsStreaming` relies on the average camera move direction from
the 3D engine however doesn't crash before a level is loaded as
`RayWorldIntersection` quits early due to the params not being
initialised, however, when a level is loaded and then unloaded, these
camera variables are not reset causing the raycast to be continued
and thus causing a crash when attempting to access `gthunks` in the
physical world.

The average camera move direction is also updated frequently, and with
these variables being unset it will still have the speed even though the
camera is not moving.

This was found when trying to use `MenuRender3DModelMgr` in GameSDK for
rendering models in scaleform on the menu - the crash occurred after
unloading a level and then reinitialising the engine for rendering on the
menu.

data.title: Cryengine engine failing on launch.
data.body:
Hi. I am new to Cryengine and would love to learn it! However, I can't even seem to be able to launch the engine. 

At first, I installed V5.3. It crashed. 
Then, I installed V5.2. It crashed.
Therefore, I installed V5.0 thinking that since its the biggest file, the others might just be updates for it.
And no! It didn't crash! However, every time I try to launch it, I get this error:

Warning!

The engine/game/editor crash and is now unstable.
Saving my cause level corruption or further crashed.

Proceed with save?

Thanks in advance :)

data.title: FBX Importer - problems with multiple LODs and axis orientation
data.body: I have several FBX models that contain LOD0 to LOD2. When I open the file in the importer, the model usually has th correct orientation. All sub meshes are mapped to LOD0 (btw, a little name parser would be cool, as most sub meshes out there probably have LODx in their name, so a pre-assignment should be possible). When I map the first non-LOD0 LOD (doesn't matter which), everything's fine. But as soon as I assign the second LOD, the **LOD0** mesh is rotated by 90° around the x axis, so it's now y up instead of z up. The model is then also imported that way: LOD0 is y up, LOD1 and LOD2 are y up.

data.title: Rain Entity not working in 5.3
data.body:
Rain entity exists in 5.3 GameSDK but when using it, it doesn't work. Also tried messing with Cvars, ect. However the SNOW entity works fine. 

For our game project we really need the Rain entity for now until we can develop our own system. Any chance of getting that working again with 5.3.1? Were hoping to have everything working for GDC.
